name: Christian Science Journal (IAPSOP)
content:
Christian Science Journal (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Christian Science Journal Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Christian Science Journal, The. Other titles: Journal of Christian Science 1883 Bimonthly, then monthly Boston, MA. Publisher: Christian Science Publishing Society. Editor: Mary Baker Glover/Eddy; Emma Curtis Hopkins. Corporate author: First Church of Christ, Scientist (Boston)1/1, April 14, 1883. Auburn University; Sara Hightower Regional Library, Georgia; Fuller Theological Seminary; Mary Baker Eddy Library, Massachusetts; LOC; NYPL; University of Texas, Austin; and many other locations in OCLC. Issues:Christian Science Journal V5 Apr 1887-mar 1888 Christian Science Journal V6 Apr 1888-mar 1889 Christian Science Journal V7 Apr 1889-mar 1890 Christian Science Journal V8 Apr 1890-mar 1891 Christian Science Journal V9 Apr 1891-mar 1892 Christian Science Journal V10 Apr 1892-mar 1893 Christian Science Journal V11 Apr 1893-mar 1894 Christian Science Journal V12 Apr 1894-mar 1895 Christian Science Journal V13 Apr 1895-mar 1896 Christian Science Journal V14 Apr 1896-mar 1897 Christian Science Journal V15 Apr 1897-mar 1898 Christian Science Journal V16 Apr 1898-mar 1899 Christian Science Journal V17 Apr 1899-mar 1900 Christian Science Journal V18 Apr 1900-mar 1901 Christian Science Journal V19 Apr 1901-mar 1902 Christian Science Journal V20 Apr 1902-mar 1903
